profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

Fine Finishes Design Inc. is a premier design and decorating firm serving the Greater Toronto area since 1997. 

We have a well earned reputation for attention to detail and professionalism in residential and commercial design.  Fine Finishes Design Inc. works closely with their clients and places special emphasis on understanding their unique needs, tastes and budget.  
Andrea Colman, the Principal Designer and Creative Director of Fine Finishes Design Inc. oversees each project personally ensuring the highest quality service.

Andrea graduated with the highest honours in the CIDC Design Program and is considered to be one of the best designers in the greater Toronto area.

Andrea is one of the founding members of The Benjamin Moore Painting and Decorating Services in North America and has sat on the Advisory Council for Benjamin Moore’s Painting and Decorating Services Canada.

profile:
Structural Restoration Systems is a family run business that has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 40 years. Over this time we have gained the trust of many top home builders, property management companies and hundreds of individual homeowners. If you are looking for a trusted contractor, look no further your experience with us is the most important thing! We provide free quotes!  

**We've won 'best of' Homestars 4 years in a row for our customer service and workmanship**

We offer a variety of services that include but are not limited to; renovations (washrooms, basements, floor plan improvements, demolition etc.), drywall repairs, exterior waterproofing, interior foundation crack repairs, fences, decks, masonry repairs including; chimneys, brick replacement, tuck pointing and concrete repairs. We also provide mini excavator services. We have remained in business for over 40 years because we always give our customers the best experience possible. We pride ourselves on receiving repeat business and recommendations. Not sure if we can help you on your project, click above on the "get a quote" button, visit our website www.srstoronto.ca or give us a call. No job is too small!
warranty_terms: 1 to 10 years depending on the job type

profile:
At Dekorum, we know how important your home is to you. That’s why you can trust our professional team to listen to your ideas and understand your vision in order to make your home remodeling dreams a reality. Our team of residential and commercial experts offers superior quality general contracting service. With years of experience in the industry, we know how to get the job done right.

*****

With over 15 years of experience, the Dekorum team has built a solid reputation with our clients. We work closely with you throughout the renovation process, and our commitment to your satisfaction is what makes us one of the leading home renovation services in the Toronto area.

*****

What Makes Us Unique?

*****

Our contractors work on both big and small projects and are always ready to assist you, no matter you are renovating a small room or an entire home or business space. We utilize the latest equipment and high quality products to realize your dream of owning a modern and stylish into reality. Your project is completed on time. Everything is done within your budget.
Minimal disruption to your home. No hassles as we manage everything. Locally-owned & operated in Toronto. We are committed to customer service.

profile:
Bathroom Renovation, Kitchen Renovation, Basement Renovation

Our process begins in the comfort of your home with a complimentary consultation. A qualified renovator will take you through our virtual gallery showing off hundreds of inspirational ideas featuring real kitchen & bathroom renovations we have completed, or are capable of offering. Have something else in mind? Splendid! We are sleuths at sourcing hard-to-find products. Together, we’ll discover functional solutions and fashionable options that suit your tastes. Once this process is complete, we’ll present you with a quote and a comprehensive plan encompassing the layout, products and details of your renovation.

As soon as you give us the green light to begin your project, we will prepare a detailed contract and a comfortable payment schedule.Then you can sit back and leave the rest to us! One of our Project Managers will coordinate with our team of skilled drywallers, carpenters, plumbers and electricians so that your dream kitchen or bathroom renovation runs smoothly. In our experience, dealing with one person is much easier for you and ensures the job is done right – the first time!

During the renovation process, rest assured we will treat your home as if it was our own. From drop sheets to vent filters, we’ll create a “bubble” around the project area to keep the space clean with minimal disruption to your household. Upon completion of the project, a cleaning crew will ensure your new kitchen or bathroom is pristine – ready to enjoy immediately – and for years to come.

For added peace of mind, we are proud to guarantee all our Toronto kitchen and bathroom renovation work for 5 years. That’s our commitment and it’s what makes the Kitchen & Bath Guys the definitive choice for discriminating homeowners… like you!

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
RM Renovation is a Toronto based renovation company with more than 20 years experience in the field.
.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. We provide high-quality construction and renovation services as well as give maximum guarantee for our services. Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Our advantages:

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!
specialities: Kitchen Renovation; Bathroom Renovation; Basement Renovation; Full House Renovations

profile:
We have been providing our construction services for almost 15 years helping our clients to renovate and enhance their living space. Novacon Construction Inc are a full DESIGN-BUILD firm focusing on large scale higher end Major renovations, Home additions and full Custom Homes. We are a very well planned company that work well with clients that are looking for a high end/professional building experience and not a jack of all trades approach. Our clients work with a professional DESIGN-BUILD team that consists of in house designer, Project manager, Site supervisor and tradesman for the duration of their build.
 
Our aim is to produce a high quality product, to perform in the most efficient way possible, and to make your renovation a positive and rewarding experience. All our trades people are highly skilled and bring with them a wealth of experience. NOVACON Custom Builders & Renovators are equipped to work on any area of your home, from major additions, basements, to bathrooms, including kitchen development and we can even build your dream home!
 
A satisfied customer is our best advertisement!!!.

profile:
Jiang's Home Renovation Inc consists teams of true hardworking Asian employees. 

Our main values are customer satisfaction and best quality jobs.

We specialize in: 
* Full House Renovation -> approximately 2  -3 months from basement to third floor
* Full Basement renovation (From start to finish approximately 4 weeks)
* Bathroom/Kitchen Refacing (New backsplash,vanity,cabinets, counter-tops installation) 
* Ceramic, Porcelain or any other types of Tile Installation - 100% flat/level result
* Vinyl, Hardwood, Engineered wood or Laminate Flooring 
* Interior and Exterior paintings include rooms, ceilings, garage doors, windows,doors, deck and fences. 
* Crown Moulding, Drywall, concrete repairs, Gutter cleaning /windows/doors caulking or re-caulking

- send us a picture or two of the design you want, we will communicate, help design and work with your budgets in order to achieve expected maximum result.

Referrals available upon request.

profile:
Thank you for visiting us here on Homestars. We are a full service home renovation company (formerly Lyons Home Improvements) serving the GTA and surrounding areas since 2005.

From minor renovations to complete remodels, we offer a wide range of residential and commercial services. We work closely with our clients to ensure that they receive a finished product that is what they want, not what we want. Our goal is to exceed expectations and develop long-term relationships. We want to be the company you choose for all your renovation needs.

We take pride not only in our work but in the customer service we provide everyone.  Once we begin your project, we promise to be there every day until it is complete, and only then will we move on.  Your satisfaction is our top priority, and our commitment to you remains after the project as we guarantee our work for two years after the date of completion.  

We would love the opportunity to meet with you, discuss your renovation needs, and provide you with a free estimate for any work you would like completed.

For more information, please visit our website at www.lyonsconstruction.ca or contact us at either (905) 427-7776 or info@lyonsconstruction.ca .
services: Kitchens, bathrooms, basements, additions, decks, fences, siding, windows / doors, painting, flooring, as well as most other areas of renovations.

Willowtree Construction Company's founder Frank Samifanni started undertaking renovation projects as a sole proprietor in 1997. Frank's philosophy in delivering quality work and that has earned him positive and solid reviews and a strong referral base. In 2007 Frank incorporated his company under Willowtree Construction Company and went full force as a General Contractor. 

Presently Willowtree Construction Company undertakes mid size to large size projects from design/ build custom built homes, additions and extensions to the existing structure, complete home renovation including kitchen, bathroom and basement renovations to structural changes . 
As a general Contracting company our trained and licensed trades carry on the work assigned with full professionalism and promptness. We love to deliver turn key projects.

profile:
Excellent Quality at a Fair Price
Properly installed fencing creates safety for your children, safety for your pets.  Properly installed decking creates beautiful and functional outdoor living space for you to enjoy with family and friends.  Why work with Ajax Fence Ltd?

We offer quality work at a fair price.

A fence is an investment in your home’s value, so you want it to stand the test of time. We can provide references from customers we've worked with over the past 40 years. We build to last. Our workmanship is excellent, so you’re never left chasing after a company for repairs.  We never overinflate our prices – we have been building fences right for over 40 years, at a fair price.

We hire only experienced full time staff.

At Ajax Fence our staff are fully experienced... some have been building fences right for close to 40 years! Employing only experienced fence builders ensures every fence is built to our exacting standards – and will last.

We only use quality materials, and do not skimp.

While some companies may offer lower prices, our jobs are priced fairly while providing proper construction using quality materials. A fence board can be installed using only one nail, or it can be done correctly to ensure it lasts.

We have history and connection.

Mark Pierson started Ajax Fence and oversees every quote, every job site and is often hands on.  We're excited that the next generation, Derek Pierson, is now taking an active role in the operation of the company.  You know who you’re working with, who is in charge of the job, and you know it will be installed correctly.

As there is no governing body for fence building – be clear of the details on any quotes you receive.  Is the installer experienced?  Does the company qualify for a current WSIB clearance certificate?  Does the company carry adequate commercial liability insurance?  Are future repair costs going to outweigh your initial savings on a lower quality of workmanship and product?

Call or email now for QUALITY fence and deck installation.

profile:
We love what we do. Custom homes is our passion and transforming your space into an environment that improves the quality of your life is our goal.

Juliette Homes is a family business that was built on relationships. We understand the value of your time and finances.

With over 30 projects going on at the same time we have become a leader in our industry, and have a reputation for being transparent, inclusive, simple and fun.

We are known to deliver exactly what we promised. We promise to always finish on time or ahead of schedule, and to never surprise you with additional costs.

profile:
14yrs of experience
Renovation & Remodeling Company
When you need remodeling work of the highest quality, you need to give Davy Reno, Inc. a call. We’re a highly qualified team of remodelers with the skills it takes to provide you with the amazing results you deserve. What’s more, we’ll do it all with the friendly manners and exceptional work ethic you can only get from local experts.
Nothing is more important to us than client satisfaction. We take your opinion seriously, and we do everything it takes to ensure that our work is up to your standards.

When you hire us, we’ll do an in-depth consultation to determine your needs. We’ll talk to you, go over your options, and come up with a plan that suits your taste, budget, and needs. When work time rolls around, we’ll show up on time and get the work done in the agreed time frame. Rest assured, it will become apparent why people all over town trust us for all their renovation needs.

Contact us now at (647) 783-8803 to learn more about us, what makes our work better than the rest, and why you should choose us for all your renovation needs.

profile:
Sanli Construction is basement renovation at its best. Our job is to turn your bare basement into a cozy, luxurious living space. With over 200 basements under our belt, we are rich in experience and maintain the highest standards. 

We are truly a one-stop shop for all your needs. Our services include building new kitchen and bathroom or renovating the old, wall partition, wall removal, bedroom building, bar, drywall, painting, electrical work, plumbing, fireplace, floor, insulation, staircase, windows, doors, and side entrance. We do everything by ourselves and don’t subcontract to others. 

Our workers work with high efficiency. This makes our price fiercely competitive. They are not run-of-the-mill labours, but are all the best in the trade and best paid too. A positive spirit in their work and a helpful, accommodating attitude towards customers is an essential part of our culture.

profile:
Welcome to Simply Exquisite, we are a construction and renovations general contractor in Toronto, serving the GTA and surrounding areas.

For over 20 years we have worked with property and homeowners providing them with high caliber commercial and home renovation services. We have earned our reputation as one of the best general contractors in the GTA through our trade expertise and professionalism. We are customer-service driven, pay extra attention to details, and deliver a quality product, on time and budget.

We approach every project with this simply promise: Every home renovation, general contracting, and construction project will be Simply Exquisite. That is our guarantee.

Whether you are looking to do a home renovation in Toronto, from kitchen design and renovations, to bathroom remodels and basement finishing, or something smaller like having your kitchen refaced or installing basement heated flooring, you can trust the best construction company in Toronto to give you the peace of mind of a job well done.

We offer award-winning renovation services that come with a 5-year warranty. We provide in-house design services and counseling, free of charge, with a licensed architectural designer. We extend this added value with every one of our projects so that you can be sure that your project will satisfy your needs.
services: We specialize in design and renovation services for kitchens, bathrooms, basements, landscaping and more!
specialities: Kitchens, bathrooms, basements, and full home renovations.

Founded in 1997, Maher Construction had become a full service management and construction company that includes new construction, interior fit-outs, construction management, interior design and architectural services.  Maher Construction has built a reputation on, and is committed to, working within the budget, ensuring that all projects are completed as per scope and schedule, and delivering the highest quality of work and service to our clients.

Each project is given personal attention by its principal Larry Maher. By maintaining an open line of communication with each member of the project and providing a leadership role throughout the construction phase, Maher Construction ensures the integrity and quality of each phase of the project. As a result, we are proud of our extensive list of repeat clients.

Our continued success is also due to our long-term relationships with clients, sub-trade contractors, consultants and employees.

At Premier Painting and Contracting our goal is to ensure your dreams come to life

Selecting the right general contractor for your renovation project is a big decision. It is important the general contractor that you select will complete your project on time and on budget. We will make the process easy and enjoyable for you. We are there to work with you every step of the way.

We Specialize in
Home Renovations, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Finished Basements, Custom Painting, Flooring, Custom Millwork, Custom Built-ins, Commercial projects, and much much more....

Why Us?
With over 35 years of experience, Premier Painting and Contracting cares about its customers' home renovation needs and is determined to provide exceptional quality service with the highest level of customer satisfaction, no matter how large or small the project... 

Our philosophy as a general contractor is based on a few key principles - trust, integrity and professionalism. We believe that our quality of work and attention to detail is second to none.

profile:
As an innovative, creative new home builder, JII FINE HOMES has redefined the experience of luxury home living for families who dream only the best. The company’s President, Jim has been actively involved for 20 years in all facets of marketing residential, multi-residential and commercial properties. Noting a lack of high-quality homes being built for discerning clients who wanted something above the ordinary, Jim has raised the bar when it comes to the creation of custom-designed luxury residences exuding architectural excellence and inspiring, spacious interiors.

JII Home Improvement is committed to creating your dream home. From something cozy, economic, and yet good looking with luxurious qualities to two story houses and large mansions, we will build it for you. Our teams of reputable builders and craftsmen turn your dream home to a reality. A place to build and have good memories for generations! We know what you need to obtain a building permit for your property. Our knowledge and know how will ensure your peace of mind.

For clients who already own a property but have not begun the design process, JII can help you design your dream home. Distinctive architectural plans, each with leading edge technologies and exquisite features are synonymous with JII FINE HOMES. 

Trust JII to build your next home or major renovation. JII renovations and additions can include architectural and interior design, obtaining all municipal approvals and scheduling contractors and trades to ensure a seamless transformation from old to new.

profile:
BRIKS (Verb/ Noun/ Adjective): Bespoke. The Art of Luxury, Redefined.

BRIKS Design-Build Group is a TARION Registered Boutique Firm, specializing in Luxury New Build Construction of Custom Residences. We offer a Full range of the Best-in-Class General Contracting Services, including Transitional Renovation and Remodeling, Kitchen Designs, and Interior Design for Residential and Commercial Clients throughout Toronto.

The construction of your home may well be the largest investment you ever make, and is a huge undertaking. Simply put, this is not the type of job in which you can leave anything to chance. When you work with BRIKS Design & Build for your new and remodeling construction projects in the G.T.A., nothing will be overlooked. 
With our experienced team of renowned Architects, Interior Designers, Engineers, and Sub- Trades; we assure you that every detail of the construction project, from initial designs to site plans, and from construction to the materials sourced and used; will only be of the highest level of caliber that we work with. Whatever your vision of your new home may entail, our bespoke BRIKS team will ensure that it is fully realized.
As a leading Design-Build Firm in the G.T.A. , not only do we provide detailed site and architectural plans from some of the most reputable Architects in Canada, but we also assist with every part of the building process. From applying for permits, to laying the foundation, to your BRIKS Pre-Delivery Inspection; we are truly your one-stop shop for all your construction needs. 
Over the last 20+ years, we’ve earned the trust of residents throughout the G.T.A. region, and we would love an opportunity to earn your trust and business.

profile:
My Mission is to help bring your dreams/visions to life while working within your budget. I believe anything is possible.  Our team/crew is constantly researching new building trends and design techniques so we can share them with you. I built this company based on affordable pricing and extreme attention to detail.  I love educating  clients as questions come up, regarding our process during your installation.  I understand, through my 10 years of experience, that changes come up and I work with you on  getting your finished product exactly how you want it.  I offer free estimates and typically meet a few additional times before, depending on the project size.  My crew and I are very meticulous when it comes to detail, spacing, cutting, and finishing.  We also value going the extra mile when it comes to ensuring long lasting products-  depth of excavation/posts for our outdoor projects,   proper waterproofing techniques for our bathrooms,  framing/electrical/plumbing to code,  permits when needed, for our kitchens and basements, ect.  I have been told by previous clients that my crew and I are very professional, clean and polite.  Our passion and love for what we do is demonstrated everyday on our project sites.   We look forward to working with you!            

Things I value most-
-Honesty
-Safety
-long lasting product
-Communication
​-Quality
-Design​

profile:
Reno-Art House Improvements offers quality renovations and remodeling. We specialize in complete  renovation including custom Homes, kitchen with load bearing walls removal, custom kitchen cabinetry, custom vanities and other cabinetry, creating opening or open concept, basement and over house renovations. All services are completed with incredible speed without affecting the quality of the finish product. Check our website at www.reno-art.ca. Our 15+ years of construction and renovation experience was brought from Europe in 2005, since that we successfully work to combine European quality with Canadian standards. 

***

We have managed to combine speed and quality services for competitive price and great quality. We are using quality materials suitable for each project for the best results. We perform the work ourselves, which allows us to have    competitive prices, and carry Civil Engineer degree that guaranty professional and quality work. 
We are a fully insured company located in Woodbridge with a wide range of experience. Our main serving areas are: Woodbridge, North York, Toronto, Markham, and all over the GTA area.

Home Remodeling, Additions, Basement Remodeling, Bathroom Remodeling, Flooring Installation, Kitchen Remodeling, Tile Installation & more.

profile:
Our goal is to provide our customers with the best possible value for the least amount of money while exceeding your expectations. We offer a complete package of quality services geared towards your renovation needs.

These include: Custom Homes, Commercial Projects, Exterior Building Restorations, Renovations, Bathroom & Kitchen Renovations, Carpentry, Plumbing, Stucco, Additions, Finished Basements, New Offices/Apartments, Electrical and many other services.

Ravineview Construction is an Ontario based renovation contractor. We provide state of the art equipment, high quality materials, skilled labor, worker’s compensation and general liability insurance and qualified supervision of our crews. Our staff pays particular attention to detail, communicates daily with project managers and is courteous to your residents needs.

Our company strives to provide our clients with superior construction and design expertise, and to create a positive building experience. We believe that continuous communication ensures that clients are fully informed every step of the way. Our expert staff is able to manage every aspect of a client’s home improvement project including plumbing, electrical and mechanical. Clients can rely on our team’s knowledge and experience in meeting deadlines, and production and quality craftsmanship. Our clients’ satisfaction is our utmost priority.

We believe in operating a renovation company with honesty and integrity, so that clients refer us to their friends and families. We believe in providing the best, efficient service possible, providing the highest quality of work in a reasonable and affordable price. If you’re thinking of bathroom renovation, kitchen renovation or any other type of renovation project you do not need to look any further. We pride to be at the top of the Toronto’s finest renovation companies.

profile:
AMARIS GROUP INC.
Our main priority is to provide our clients with the highest quality of work, yet at the best price possible. We bring an insider’s knowledge of costs and an excellent employees and professional trades to deliver consistently competitive pricing on a variety of projects. Our creative thinking on alternatives and options to stay within budget and at the same time say ahead of the competition in terms of quality of the structure.
CONSTRUCTION & RENOVATION
We can come and take measurement of your project and prepare complete "permit ready" drawing (from scratch) Showing the changes that you are planning to make. Drawing that we prepare would include all architectural structural and building code. Related specifications needed Amaris Group as well will take care of applying for and obtain a building permit for your project.
Once the designer and architect have conceptualized and planned your dream home renovation, Remodeling, walls removal and structural works, the Project Manager selects the appropriate professional employees and trades to start your project exactly to spec and, of course, to the highest quality.
1. Renovation & Remodeling
2. walls removals, structural works
We work to bring exceptional customer service that guarantees your satisfaction. You can depend on our professional employees and trades that will provide you with a right solution to solve any problems. We are dedicated to your satisfaction and get the job done right. Your safety comes first - we care about your safety, comfort and peace of mind and We value "Quality work" and our goal is to bring comfort to your home and ultimately your family. We specialize in Construction, Renovation, Remodeling, and structural works like steel beams, or LVL beams removal and installation. Our knowledgeable professional employees and trades team is fully prepared to help you with any issues and inquiries regarding your project. 
In case of an emergency Amaris Group Inc. is always available to help you to bring Your satisfaction. 
Give us a call and our team will be there to help you out today!

profile:
The history of NDG Group dates back to 2005 when it was founded in Georgia by Archil Tabatadze. Archil Tabatadze has a master’s degree in construction management. Despite all obstacles and high competition, NDG Group has been maintaining its professional image and high quality of service, as well as the philosophy that comes with it. Due to our dedication to these values, the company showed up in the Canadian Market in 2015. Today, NDG represents a fully bonded and insured General Contracting Company.
Meeting existing challenges and with the obtained professional experience, Archil made a decision to create a professional team that offers top quality customer service.
The principles NDG Group is based on are very simple, one project – one team. We are not hiring sub-contractors. We are building a future by ourselves.
NDG Group does not want to speak in general terms or use empty expressions. We are offering you our model of work performance insuring our professional image and competition advantages.
The Company is divided into teams, with each group being represented by a minimum of two professionals. Each team is equipped with present-day tools, and have the needed professional experience, personal qualities and great commitment to their work.

King  Arman renovation & construction inc. has been in the construction industry for 10+ years. We work hard and dedicated to our work and to Get the job done and satisfy our clients.

profile:
Bianka Design&Build is a full service design and remodeling firm serving Great Toronto Area. Providing complete kitchen and bathroom remodeling, Bianka Design&Build has everything you need from design and supply to installation. We strive to deliver the best in high-value services at the right price for you.

At Bianka Design&Build, we are equal parts builder and designer. Whether you’re looking for modern, traditional, contemporary, rustic or any style in between, our team of interior designers will work with you to identify the look that’s right for your space while our builders execute that plan to create a look that corresponds to your individual taste. Our mission is to provide the highest level of service and quality. There’s not a single design challenge or building constraint that our builders can’t overcome or find a solution for. We treat each remodeling project with the same care we’d want for ourselves, and we’re committed to creating spaces that look and feel the way our clients envision.
services: Kitchen Renovations/Bathroom Renovations/Basement Renovations/General Contracting
specialities: Custom Cabinets & Doors
